resources.string: Enter the names of the places you\'d like to eat at into fields. \n\nPress DECIDE FOR ME to have a random place picked for you.

Welcome to Luncheon Roulette! I'm the developer Jireh Lo, a computer science student at NYU.


I decided to make this app after realizing how long it takes my friends to decide where to eat. Often someone will shout out a place to go, but no one will agree or disagree to the suggestion. I guess no one wants to be the person who decides for the group. So I made an app to decide for us!


I hope you enjoy using the app! Special thanks to my brother for drawing the icon, and my church pastor for coming up with the name for the app. If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to comment on the app page.
Reads the chosen destination out loud
